name: Joel Cupelli
title: Cybersecurity Professional
about: I am a dedicated Cybersecurity professional with a passion for safeguarding digital environments. With a solid foundation in various IT certifications and hands-on experience, I am well-prepared to tackle the challenges of today's cybersecurity landscape. I thrive in ever-changing environments that require adaptive and forward-thinking strategies to protect against emerging threats. As I look for new opportunities, I aim to bring my skills and knowledge to an organization that values security and innovation.
